website_summaries.verdict: If you're willing to trade screen size for a superior physical keyboard, the BlackBerry Classic is a fantastic productivity phone for old-school QWERTY junkies.
pros: The BlackBerry Classic couples a comfortable, accurate keyboard with an attractive design that's sure to please BlackBerry fans
Support for Android apps will please the rest of us, too
cons: The spacious four-row keyboard results in a smaller, cramped screen

website_summaries.verdict: The BlackBerry Classic is a great voice and messaging phone that can't deliver on the range of online services most people need.

customer_reviews.title: It's a joke do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This phone arrived in an envelope. It was not even in a box. There is clear wear and tear to the charging port. And several dings around the metal casing. It came with an off brand charger, that pushed 1 amp. Phones this new need MINIMUM 2.4 amps to obtain a good healthy charge. This phone is not factory unlocked, it has a Verizon logo clear as day. Because it is charging so slow I havent even been able to turn it on to see if it is carrier unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my device today. I chose to go with a Blackberry to start my new Small Mobile Business, because I know the brand provides fantastic battery life, out of this world security, and above all I have used Blackberrys in the past for business. I see I chose coreectly again this time. I will mention I was a little annoyed when it arrived and it had Verizon branding all over it, but it is indeed unlocked and works with my TMobile SIM no problem. Would definitely recommend for the business person or entrepreneur!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Be very aware of these Sellers!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even use the phone took it to Metro/T-Mobile and the tech couldn't place the sim in slot therefore it was rendered as a broken phone. One Stsr because I was sold a defective phone😡
customer_reviews.author: Kool Handz

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It does everything that I need it to do and then some. At the moment, I have zero complaints about anything. I am 100% happy with my purchase and 100% happy with the process. And, for me, that's really saying something :) EDIT: NOTE: The WiFi calling is a total fail. I found out that it is because T-Mobile will not officially support WiFi calling or texting from devices not purchased directly from them. Yes, they released an app for blackberry devices, but it will ONLY work for blackberry devices that you bought from them. FYI. I still love the phone, but I am just not especially happy with my carrier ;)
customer_reviews.author: J. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone for decent price
customer_reviews.text: Blackberry has come a long way in hardware phones. I think this time, they have hit the nail on the head in terms of combining the best of previous blackberry phones. They brought back the trackpad with physical buttons which is a nice touch. The keys are well-sized and laid out, the display is decent at best (nothing to brag about). The camera is surprisingly sharp. The overall build quality of this device screams "Professional"; it feels very solid in the hand. All in all, a decent device for a decent price. My only real gripe is Blackberry OS 10, but I don't think it's fair to review this phone based on the software, since software spans across several devices.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great work phone - quality issues?
customer_reviews.text: So far the Classic Blackberry has been a great addition to my workflow. I never realized just how much I missed the physical keyboard. I use this primarily as a work phone (not personal) so I have not been taking advantage of all the software features. Build quality has been hit or miss - I'm on my third device in a month. First device shipped with a volume up button that was stuck in the depressed position. Second unit 'p' key become slightly depressed and didn't have the right 'spring back action' after a week. Hands down still the best type of device for a work phone.
customer_reviews.author: BrianInChicago

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Best Phone on the Market!! Literally I bought the refurbished one for like $97 and its lasted me 3 years and still don't plan on buying a new phone its absolutely amazing recommend blackberry to everybody!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - hardware keypad makes all the difference, and really great copy/paste functionality
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy for this phone. The keyboard and easy copy/paste abiltiy on this phone make it the most user friendly phone on the market. I find it so difficult to use a keyboard on a screen, but this hardware keyboard makes it so easy. I also really appreciate the high level of security on this phone with so many malware apps out there for android. It has a good sized screen and long battery life. This is my second bb phone and I loved the previous one too.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Not well refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: The camera has dust particles. The side is roughed up and scratched,the screen has man fine scratches. This was advertised as like new/good condition and it looks used and in OK condition. Cannot take a clear photo. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Giq

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Nobody carries the bandwidth these run on, no ATT, Verizon, Sprint/Tmobile, I wished I could have a good phone without dropping a grand. Most importantly I wanted a phone with a rubber backside so it does not slip out of my pocket at work when Im underneath a truck. sorry buddy you gotta go with the Key2 because BB is cancelling support for the OS these run on, totally obsolete
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Business goes Black once again
customer_reviews.text: Check what you need your phone for and then make your choice. For those with pure business needs (calls, SMS and emails) with some side chatting on BBM/WhatApp, the BlackBerry Classic is an excellent consolidation of the old and new. The keypad allows swift typing and OS10 has improved greatly with 10.3. One can finally feel something of significance in their hand when carrying the Classic, and it is not as bulky as presumed (you can keep it in your back pocket without fear of bending). I get my full day work done on the phone without any recharging during the day. From 8am to midnight, and I still have 30% or so remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Fawad S.

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I have been with blackberry for a long time. I love this phone a lot! The keyboard is amazing! It is very clicky and I huge plus for me. The screen for me is the perfect size and is nice and bright! There is no lag at all! The battery is great as well! I take my phone off the charger at 6:30 am it still has 43 percent left at 10:30. It does come with the amazon app store so there is a lot more apps available. If you had a older blackberry with a pkb you should get this phone, it is a huge improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Cameo

customer_reviews.title: This is the best phone I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I have ever owned. I have had them all - Samsung, I-phone, Blackberries. This is the ultimate merger between a really good touch screen phone with lightning fast browser capabilities with the awesome Blackberry keyboard. This phone is a total home run. Blackberry has nailed it!!!!. I would highly recommend purchasing this phone.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So upset didn't work with my Verizon SIM card. Would pick up for a second then change to t-mobile? Otherwise worked great with Wi-Fi and transfer of my contacts, calendar etc...great phone but beware of potential problem with carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Luca  J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 1 year now for work. I cant imagine life without this incredible smartphone! everything runs great on this, even the android apps. Google play store easily installs on it.
customer_reviews.author: sanjay ramkissoon

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the market for a Blackberry at this point, I'd just await the release of the Priv. This phone is a great phone, but coming from a Galaxy S4, there are some things I miss. With the android based Priv most of the shortcomings of the classic will be addressed. Including the availability of some apps I've grown accustomed to. Otherwise this is a fantastic phone, that I'm really enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: Arne S

customer_reviews.title: Resolve plan.
customer_reviews.text: This phone came charged, it seems the battery or usb cable is faulty .. it only charged once to 100% .. once it drained the phone has never turned on .. it keeps blinking luminous green and red when connected to power.
customer_reviews.author: Sam oduor the

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: I am super satisfied with my purchase! very clean quality , i am in africa and it’s working on all mobile network .. Thanks you very much
customer_reviews.author: Mbaye Camara

customer_reviews.title: best phone on market
customer_reviews.text: The blackberry classic is the best phone on the market the keyboard is a dream to type on and also the os runs fast and smooth and battery life is amazing great upgrade from my bold 9900 recommend any one try a classic you will love having a physical keyboard in your life. And also having the trackpad and toolbelt makes things way more productive and faster navigating a phone anyone who needs to get things done fast such as email bbm texts make and end phone calls having the BlackBerry toolbelt will help out a lot. The ultimate business as well as personal device all wrapped up into one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but not a new phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived on time and was well packed. However, this is NOT a new phone. It’s refurbished. The wrapping on the phone is aftermarket, it didn’t come with any written material, and there are some very light scratches on the exterior case. Still a good phone and it works well, but be advised you’re not getting a new device.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Klein

customer_reviews.title: This is a true Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Great Price!!!! I absolutely love this phone. It's much better than the blackberry's of old. I really think it's the best one yet (I haven't tried the priv). Blackberry still has work to do in terms of ease of use and compatibility but I love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Richards

customer_reviews.title: I really do like the phone
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the phone, but there is just not enough power and pixels for me. Love the form factor, keyboard, and weight, but Blackberry really needs to merge the specs of the Passport with the Classic, and I think they will have a winner. Once again, very good, but not there yet. I have been using the passport for several weeks now and really do like it a lot. I would absolutely love it, if it had the form factor of the Classic.
customer_reviews.author: Percy Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: It says it's unlocked but i received a Verizon version
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to be unlocked but unfortunately, I received the Verizon version when I have an AT&T SIM card.

customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Q10 and I love, love, love the investment! I'm hoping that other Blackberry loyals will buy this phone and put BB back on the map!

customer_reviews.text: Inseting USIM, it doesn't connect the network. I called the network company and tried to slove it. They told me it would be the phone problem.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing i don't really like about this phone is that its kinda heavy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i don't really like about this phone is that its kinda heavy, and big. but that i guess most people don't care. For some people who consider buying this mobile might be thinking that they want control by buttons and I am one of them. the classic is amazing at that. as P for go previous page N for Next page on browsing, Q - show all the windows, W -new windows, U - search bar. You'll like taking a call by pressing button instead of swiping.

customer_reviews.text: She loves her Blackberry Classic. Took it out of the box and started using it right away.

customer_reviews.title: Great BB device!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with device, in great shape and everything works great! Would buy again! Happy to add to my collection!

customer_reviews.title: Please check used phones before selling them online.thanks

customer_reviews.title: Still loyal to Blackberry and happy with the Classic
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Blackberry. The calls are clear. The response time on the web and to my use of the controls is very fast and accurate. The camera works much better than the older models and takes consecutive pictures almost instantaneously. Of course, the keyboard -- the main reason I wanted a new Blackberry -- is wonderful. As I am not one to watch t.v. shows or movies or play games on my phone, the screen and resolution are more than adequate. It certainly is a big improvement over the Torch which I had for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vassallo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The phone was dead when it arrived, not only that but it at&t..... It say black berry classic unlock, I didn't expect a at&t logo on the back and NO it doesn't work with straight talk.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Physical QWERTY Keyboard Phone
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bold 9900 and was obsessed with it. Then I got a Q10 and hated it, had so many problems with it. I had all but given up on BlackBerry but I was so attracted to the physical keyboard, which makes texting, emailing and web browsing a breeze. The build quality of this phone is high end and nicely done. The keyboard is the best keyboard on the market. The screen is great and easy to read in bright sunshine. I love the browser and the camera as well. Its just the perfect phone and I am so thrilled with it!

customer_reviews.text: I love the old school feel of the Blackberry phone and I have had several of them. Easy to use and simple to understand.

customer_reviews.title: There's just something so nice to going back to BlackBerry
customer_reviews.text: Loveee the Classic. There's just something so nice to going back to BlackBerry. Everything is just so well organised. Sure, it's missing apps, but between App World, Amazon App Store and Google Play sideloaded, you're good. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.text: I love it. As far as customer service and speed it was perfect. I recieved Emails speedy the pack came one day earlier than told. The phone itself is great the only two problems I have is the side button do not work and the battery is not as good as I wanted but it is still verygood

customer_reviews.title: BB User
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and phone. I always end up back to the BB phones after using so many phones. I love my bb series.

customer_reviews.title: Great BlackBerry device
customer_reviews.text: Great BlackBerry device! I have nothing bad to say about the Classic. It has a solid, premium build, and just the right screen size. I highly recommend this phone for anyone looking for a great smart phone device that is great for productivity and play. This device does it all!
customer_reviews.author: drogers81

customer_reviews.title: Great "classic" feel of BlackBerry's latest attempt at bridging the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great "classic" feel of BlackBerry's latest attempt at bridging the gap between the past and the future of technology. There are a few intricate details resulted from overuse that I am not particularly fond of, but might be able to work around once I have enough time to play with the device thoroughly. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Love the
customer_reviews.text: the phone is everything i would expect from Blackberry. Love the phone

customer_reviews.title: this could change the tables for blackberry
customer_reviews.text: We all know BlackBerry has gone though some difficulty in the past but I feel like this device might help them progress. The keyboard is absolutely amazing; phones fits perfectly in your hand, hub takes time to get used to but after a while I grew to actually like it. I was an android user. The only reason this device gets a 4 and not a 5 would be because of the lack of applications compared to android devices. Even with the amazon store you are still limited. Also the restart time is slow although it doesn't make the biggest difference
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent phone! It has some weight to it but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent phone! It has some weight to it but is comfortable in the hand. I love BlackBerry 10!
customer_reviews.author: Monica S. Reigle

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it. I really did.
customer_reviews.text: It is almost the perfect phone. Almost. Keyboard is AMAZING and build quality is superb, on par with Apple without a doubt. The software and CPU problems just got in the way: Super sluggish Android apps (It's so slow Spotify music stutters), almost nonexistent native BB10 apps, and downright terrible camera prompted me to return it after a few days and go back to iPhone. The keyboard was SO nice though. It was a hard decision.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: You cant connected it with metro
customer_reviews.text: I loved the phone but the reason I bought it was to get it connected and we'll it really blue me away when I couldn't connected it but ya it didn't work with metro pcs

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone with a solid performance. It's not going to win any speed contests but it gets the job done. It you are looking for a Blackberry with a physical keyboard this is a great phone. This is definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: mark hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Phone was amazing!! i loved it! unfortunately i had to return it because it wasn't compatible with Verizon, but the device was awesome that i ended up buying it again from Verizon! Sound, speed, and typing experience was great.
customer_reviews.author: Rmando

customer_reviews.title: No problems at all - works OK.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for a relative that lives abroad. It worked as expected (two thumbs up).

customer_reviews.title: Fix the Viber app.
customer_reviews.text: BB Classic Smartphone is a great piece of gadget ..... except I cannot use " Viber app " to talk and text ... It is not supported by BB Classic ...I hope you can fix the problem in due course of time ....Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: I love the blackberry and all of its functions
customer_reviews.text: I love the blackberry and all of its functions, its just that my blackberry that I recently purchase continues to die every time I get to 22%
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Morales

customer_reviews.title: It's alive, it's alive!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yes baby, this a modern BlackBerry that is reliable with the endiing of the calls! I hate Z10 and Q10 was used only with a magnetic pouch. Long live tool belt ! I wish to see it on all touchscreen soon-to-come models
customer_reviews.author: Manouras Michail

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry Just Gets Better And Better
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of blackberry. I went from the blackberry q10 to the blackberry classic. The classic is just an upgrade from the q10. I love the blackberry classic by far my favorite until they come out with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Great Hidden Features
customer_reviews.text: It's more than i expected...Combination of touchscreen w/Physical keyboard NFC, FM Radio, and Blackberry Hub
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BlackBerry Classic on Straight Talk
customer_reviews.text: This phone has everything you love about blackberry from 6 years ago with the features of a modern smart phone. It does not have all of the aps that an Android or iPhone would have, but it has what you need to accomplish daily tasks. I use this on the Straight Talk network with an AT&T nano sim card and it works flawlessly. You will need to adjust the APN settings to be able to send MMS messages, but it is very easy to do. I look forward to using this phone and seeing what BlackBerry will develop in the future.
customer_reviews.author: wsgordon

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry nailed it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big review writer but this phone rocks. It feels as solid as anything I have ever used. The keyboard is the BEST BB keyboard ever. BB10 runs flawlessly. All I can say is that Blackberry simply got it right. Their marketing sucks because everyone who has touched this phone loves the interface. The ability to peek at your email is quite possibly the best feature of any phone anywhere. Is it my boss? No? Carry on then!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith G

customer_reviews.title: THE CLASSIC ROCKS....BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This is what the Q10 was supposed to be. The removal of the track wheel and the 4 control buttons was the biggest mistake Blackberry ever made. Write this down: THE BLACKBERRY CLASSIC WILL STORM THE CELLPHONE WORLD IN 2015 just as long as Chen can make enough to meet the demand. Yes, it will take a long time to erase all the negativity created by this company during their collapse, this phone will burn through it all. For a long time, I thought I would be stuck with the 9900, and to this day I used it as my primary phone. NON TOUCH SCREEN CELLPHONES WILL ALWAYS HAVE A HORRIBLE TYPING EXPERIENCE... **********************BLACKBERRY IS BACK ***************************************************** SUPERB PHONE...
customer_reviews.author: Roy Lange

customer_reviews.title: blackberry Classic
customer_reviews.text: Best smartphone in the plante to be used in a third world country! Excellent for 3G. Querty keyboard best ever. Pls mouse :)
customer_reviews.author: Sybela Eastman-Vinueza

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this phone. The convenience of having that familiar tool belt, but the technology used with the Q10. Little heavier than the Q10, slight bit bigger too. Just wish the battery were changeable, but it's fixed. They need to come up with a solution on that battery issue.
customer_reviews.author: Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY BLACKBERRY CLASSIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been with iPhone for many years and came back to BB and I'm happy I did. :)

customer_reviews.title: Best BlackBerry yet
customer_reviews.text: Best BlackBerry yet! The calendar program was better on the Bold but this is faster, with a bigger screen and just great!! Cannot live without it!

customer_reviews.title: The commands keep shifting and you have to be very ...
customer_reviews.text: The commands keep shifting and you have to be very careful how you hold the device or your emails disappear It does not work the same as the 9700 or bold and I cannot get used to this. WHen the emails disappear I canntot it does go into save mode or save draft liek the older models. I still cannto find the memo button. ANd it is s much bigger thanthe bold.ALso, the one they sent me was from the UK so I have to be sensitive to the time mode.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, shipping was fast
customer_reviews.text: Excellent , shipping was fast , item was exactly as described, very satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: Great for emails
customer_reviews.text: It's not the top smartphone on the market, but you can't get anything better for emails than this phone.

customer_reviews.text: What can I say the best product coming in my life Thank you so much blackberry The best phone . No iPhone no Galaxy no Microsoft phone Blackberry you are the best
customer_reviews.author: MANUEL DIAZ C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, had to have the keyboard, glad I did not get an iPhone or Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Hakon P Nagelgaard

customer_reviews.title: Old/new blackberry
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a blackberry 8520 which lasted nearly 10 years with this new Blackberry Classic. I wanted many of the features from the old phone with the smart phone capabilities the Classic offers, i.e. 4g speed and 16 gig storage, along with the classic keyboard and new touch screen features. So far I am extremely happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Defective touchscreen, but great phone. hope my new one is fine!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the phone, I seemed to have gotten a bad one. My touchscreen didn't was really disappointed. I guess you cant always get everyone perfect online. Waiting for my refund, and ordering another one, cross your fingers its not a lemon.

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever, for those who still can't, won't or don't want to use a I phone. Love the combo of old and new. Short of a few marginal apps, best phone BB has produced in my 20 years using the product
customer_reviews.author: Mike1961

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For people who want a REAL smart phone, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was forced away from Blackberry by my company and tried a few of the all touch screen phones and ultimately came back to this. I missed the keyboard so much. It is a shame developers won't make more apps for the Blackberry because it is a great product. I was able to sideload Good For Enterprise so I could still get my company email on the device. It isn't quite as good as native emails but good enough for that. It is nice they finally partnered with the amazon app store but I really wish developers would make more native Blackberry apps (I don't blame them for not doing it though as we Blackberry lovers are a dying breed)
customer_reviews.author: jsjj42000

customer_reviews.title: the order came in perfect  condition,  very much on time and  I am quit happy with every thing that I ordered. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to get my head around the BB classic but it froze one night and it is back to normal.The whole order came in perfect condition and I am quite pleased with everything
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Adogbeji Ernest IDEH

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A BLACKBERRY WORTH BUYING!!!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY A BLACKBERRY WORTH BUYING!!! Absolutely love this phone, actually have been waiting for bold like keyboard, with touch screen + track pad. You don't realize how often you use back key, or track pad as a mouse on the browser, or even editing text... this thing just flies and answers to everything I throw at it. Welcome back Blackberry... new CEO has his act together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone!! Track pad!! Keyboard!! Super fast, very configurable, apps downloaded from Amazon (Waze among them) all work fine, contacts super simple to transfer from pc via bluetooth, hub very practical, screen crystal clear and easy to read, customizable ringtones, whatsapp works perfectly...in fact, everything works perfectly. Have encountered no problems whatsoever. Just a great device in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalama

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have been using iPhones for a few years now and although it has all the apps you could ever want, it is just not functional to use as a work phone. That being said, I have found the Classic to be a wonderful device and side-loading SNAP allows me to use most of the apps not found on BB World and Amazon. So far the only apps I could not use were Google Voice and Google Wallet.
customer_reviews.author: capital one

customer_reviews.title: The product is a great improvement over the 9900Bold
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great improvement over the 9900Bold. The only reason not to give it a five star rating is a software glitch which does not allow it to be charged when turned off. That should be corrected in the next version of software. The customer service is superior.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: I did like this phone - it has a nice durable feel
customer_reviews.text: I did like this phone - it has a nice durable feel. It lasted 31 days before the battery crapped out. Naturally this left me in the lurch. I doubt I will get another blackberry classic to replace it. Its not just blackberry though, I'm just tired of paying good money for products that do not have any longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E Jessee Jr

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made device
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made device. Compared to my previous Q10 however I find that the toolbelt makes swiping from the bottom edge somewhat erratic, and that the larger screen and keys don't justify a change as the internals are basically the same.
customer_reviews.author: Efecege

customer_reviews.title: And it was not brand new it was used phone sooooooo idk about this dealer but in general the phone is awesome I love it
customer_reviews.text: Came with no charger in the Box. No USB cable either. And it was not brand new it was used phone sooooooo idk about this dealer but in general the phone is awesome I love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Faran

customer_reviews.title: I had to buy a used product. But it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a used product. But it did not contain the earphones. I've purchased a full component. However, the product is a new product.
customer_reviews.author: jungjisu

customer_reviews.title: BlackBerry Is Back!
customer_reviews.text: This BlackBerry Classic is a very solid and well built phone. BlackBerry is back.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Owings

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting this phone since the release of BlackBerry ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this phone since the release of BlackBerry 10. At last one can have android apps plus trackpad and qwerty keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Licpolu

customer_reviews.title: I loved the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I loved the keyboard, but the operating system was very difficult to get used to, even after a month of use. It also froze on my more than once.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mill

customer_reviews.title: Back to Blackberry!
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting to jump back into a Blackberry after leaving for an Iphone a few years back. Considered the Passport, but the size was just a tad tolarge for me. However, the classic is just right in 99% of what I was wanting to get out of a Blackberry (OS is smooth, keyboard is PERFECT, screen is crisp and clear). The only reason I give the Classic a 4.5 and not a 5 is for the App defeciency although with Snap it can be resolved. Overall very pleased and highly reccomend to anyone wanting to jump back!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the sound went off after 3 weeks and Blackberry dosnt have repair center in Mexico
customer_reviews.author: Gianluigi Zaniboni

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I waited for so long to upgrade my BB Torch. But sadly, this was just too big for me to operate with 1 hand :( Also, i was disappointed that the apps market didn't improve as i had expected with the addition of Amazon apps. No Google Voice, Hulu or Netflix etc.
customer_reviews.author: Della Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Months in to the use of this and it's a classic!!!
customer_reviews.author: C I

customer_reviews.title: This is an ATT version phone and is not a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an ATT version phone and is not a new one. Phone has dust and the package is not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: SHEKAR Y

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. The same features I am used to, but better
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone. if you are a BB fan go ahead and get it.
customer_reviews.author: Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone and I am putting the IPhone back on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: gary D

customer_reviews.title: Returning Classic for AT&T does not support @att.blackberry.net email
customer_reviews.text: The only email address I have is my @att.blackberry.net Bought this phone to replace older blackberry After confirming on BlackBerry website that I could keep and easily transition my secure blackberry email, which is ONLY accessible on the individual blackberry device (so no receiving on old device via wifi) Per today's call to the Classic 30 day support#.only phones prior Blackberry OS10 can access the blackberry.net email and there are no plans to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and sturdier than other otterboxes I have bought before for other devices. 10 stars all the way. Keep up to good work. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Billy boy

customer_reviews.title: Still a Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Over a it's a Great phone and I really like it. Only down side is one of the speakers DON'T work, so just know your taking your chances cause the phones are "refurbished". But for the price (even with only one working speaker) it's still a Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: zacharie jeannot

product_meta.title: Blackberry Classic Smartphone Factory Unlocked
product_meta.description: BlackBerry is back with the BlackBerry Classic smartphone. The advanced device incorporates enhanced BlackBerry features such as the legendary QWERTY keypad, BlackBerry Hub, BlackBerry Assistant, and much more. The smartphone is powered by Qualcomm’s 1.5GHz MSM 8960 processor that ensures you never face annoying glitches or lag. A 2GB RAM facilitates seamless switching between open apps. The smartphone operates on the BlackBerry 10 OS, which offers several new features for boosting collaboration, productivity, and communication. Capturing high resolution photos and videos is easy with the mobile’s 8MP rear camera with 5x digital zoom, flash, and autofocus, as well as the 2MP fixed focus front camera. The smartphone’s integrated Dual Band WiFi and 4G LTE support brings high speed Internet connectivity at your disposal. A 2515mAh nonremovable Lithium Ion battery is capable of powering this device for more than 20 hours on a single charge. Overall dimensions that measure 131 x 72.4 x 10.2mm, and a low weight of 178g, make it easy to slide this sleek black phone in and out of your pockets and purses with minimal effort.
